DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate ATP-induced Pain (AIP) and ATP-induced dermal vasodilation (AIDV) as target engagement tools for future development of analgesics.
DOC.brief_title: Study to Evaluate ATP-induced Pain and ATP-induced Dermal Vasodilation by Iontophoresis (0000-118)(COMPLETED)
DOC.criteria: Subject is in generally good health Subject is willing to abstain from smoking within 24 hours of each iontophoresis treatment and limit smoking to 5 or less cigarettes per week during the study Subject has a history of dermatitis, psoriasis, or eczema Subject has active asthma and/or hay fever at the time of the screening visit Subject is unable to refrain from use of analgesics within 3 days prior to each treatment period
